verbs.description: EAST HARLEM , Manhattan — Hundreds of [ARG1: children] [V: taken] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: under President Donald Trump 's family separation policy] are at an East Harlem facility , Mayor Bill de Blasio said Wednesday .
